discourse_list.title: Add UNI to Genie Airdrop recipients

content.content: It’s simple. USDC < UNI, therefore propose adding UNI to each airdrop recipient from the Genie acquisition list. Adds to total community synergy and aligned incentives. Disclaimer: I will not be receiving this airdrop.
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes adding UNI to each airdrop recipient from the Genie acquisition list, as it adds to total community synergy and aligned incentives. The author clarifies that they will not be receiving this airdrop. A third party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: No thank you. The last thing we need for the UNI token is more inflation.
Airdrop stimulates interest in the token and attracts new users , and this is the main thing !
